amendment.description: To improve the language relating to the memorial.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4062 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4062 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S11325-11326; text: CR S11324-11325) To improve the language relating to the memorial.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4062 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Conrad.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4062 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
